price: 2. Kitaab toosan, si uu uga digo cadaab daran oo Xagga (Alle) ah, uguna bishaareeyo mu'miniinta samaha fala inay leeyihiin Abaalgud Wanaagsan (Janno).
arabic: قَيِّمٗا لِّيُنذِرَ بَأۡسٗا شَدِيدٗا مِّن لَّدُنۡهُ وَيُبَشِّرَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ ٱلَّذِينَ يَعۡمَلُونَ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ أَنَّ لَهُمۡ أَجۡرًا حَسَنٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qayyiman liyundhira basan shadīdan min ladun'hu wayubashira al-mu'minīna alladhīna yaʿmalūna al-ṣāliḥāti anna lahum ajran ḥasanan
